info.name: Capstone Food Delivery API Collection v4.0.0

body.raw:
{
  "name": "{{random_menu_item}}",
  "description": "Test menu item created via API for validation",
  "preparationTimeMinutes": 15,
  "packagingSize": "Regular",
  "unitOfMeasure": "serving",
  "pricePerUOM": 12.99,
  "category": "Test Category",
  "cuisine": "Test Cuisine",
  "ingredients": ["Test ingredient 1", "Test ingredient 2"],
  "allergens": ["Test allergen"],
